meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mark Allen Tim Dicarlo Judith Seeger Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #716.

td.p: Mark Allen, a special projects manager originally from New York City
Tim Dicarlo, a student originally from Niagara Falls, New York
Judith Seeger, an associate research engineer from Mountain View, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $14,699)

tr.td: FAMOUS BROTHERS
SCIENCE
WHITE HOUSE WHEELS
PLAYS
"ONLY" SONGS
RHYME TIME
